full_text:
Re: Fwd: Epstein Article
From: Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
To: [redacted]
Date: 2020/01/06 13:15
Subject: Re: Fwd: Epstein Article
Attachments: TEXT.htm

I don't think that he was approved to send out pictures and other stuff. Now what he does with his medical report is a different story.

Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836-[redacted]
Black Berry: 646-423-[redacted]
[redacted]@bop.gov

[redacted] 1/6/2020 1:14 PM >>>
Wow, should the examiner have released this without the BOP knowledge. Dang, he had all that junk in his cell.

>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 1/6/2020 12:06 PM >>>
Check this out. We will never be able to move forward with all the craziness!

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-7855039/Graphic-photos-Jeffrey-Epsteins-autopsy-reveal-bloodied-neck.html

Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836-[redacted]
Black Berry: 646-423-[redacted]
[redacted]@bop.gov

Page 3873
DOJ-OGR-00024356
